warscrolls.name: Alchemite Warforger
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Runic Crucible
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN** unit wholly within 12" of this unit and roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to save rolls for that unit until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Assassin
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

abilities.name: Hidden Murderer
abilities.effect: While this unit is within the combat range of a friendly **INFANTRY** unit that has 5 or more models and there are no enemy units within this unit’s combat range, this unit is not visible to enemy units.

abilities.name: In For The Kill
abilities.effect: This unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** if it charged in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Battlemage
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Magic of the Realms
abilities.effect: Pick a **SPELL** ability that this unit can use. For the rest of the battle, add 1 to casting rolls for this unit when it uses that **SPELL** ability.

warscrolls.name: Battlemage on Celestial Hurricanum
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Wizard (1), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Portents of Battle
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to D3 visible friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for the targets’ combat attacks until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Storm of Shemtek
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Make a number of D3 rolls equal to the current battle round number. For each 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Battlemage on Griffon
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Fly, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

melee.name: Griffon’s Razor Claws and Twin Beaks

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Griffon’s Razor Claws and Twin Beaks** is 4.

abilities.name: Ghurish Ferocity
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Griffon’s Razor Claws and Twin Beaks** for attacks that target enemy **MONSTERS** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Battlemage on Luminark of Hysh
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Wizard (1), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Aura of Protection
abilities.effect: Friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** units have **WARD (6+)** while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Searing Beam of Light
abilities.effect: Each time this unit attacks with its **Searing Beam of Light**, pick a point on the battlefield within range to be the target. If the attack scores a hit, draw a straight line between that point and the closest point on this unit’s base. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each visible unit (friendly and enemy) that the line passes across.

warscrolls.name: Black Ark Corsairs
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

abilities.name: Skilled Swashbucklers
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Black Ark Fleetmaster
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

abilities.name: 'At Them, You Curs!'
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect:
Pick a friendly **Black Ark Corsairs** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target.

The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Black Guard
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

abilities.name: Steel and Sorcery
abilities.effect: While any friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR AELF INFANTRY HEROES** are wholly within this unit’s combat range, both this unit and those friendly units have **WARD (5+)**.

warscrolls.name: Bleakswords
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

abilities.name: Merciless Conquerors
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons while it is contesting an objective you do not control.

warscrolls.name: Bren Tylis, the Renegade Saint
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Yondara's Guidance
abilities.effect: The first time this unit would be destroyed, before removing it from the battlefield, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit is not destroyed and any remaining damage points inflicted on it have no effect. Then, **Heal (5)** this unit.

abilities.name: Well Travelled
abilities.effect: Remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 3" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Brethren of the Bolt
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Crackling with Faith
abilities.effect: Each time a combat attack made by this unit scores a critical hit, you can pick an enemy unit within 6" of this unit that was not the target of that combat attack. Inflict 1 mortal damage on that enemy unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Bolt From the Blue
abilities.declare: You can pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target. Then, make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: This unit has **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the turn. If a target was picked, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. If the chanting roll was 10+, inflict 3 mortal damage on the target instead.

abilities.name: Pater Filius
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Pater Filius** is on the battlefield, it has **PRIEST (1)**.

warscrolls.name: Callis and Toll
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Wily to the Last
abilities.effect: If this unit has 2 models and would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, 1 model in this unit is slain.

abilities.name: Right Tools For The Job
abilities.effect: Double the Damage characteristic of this unit’s weapons for attacks that target **WIZARDS**, **PRIESTS** and **MANIFESTATIONS**.

abilities.name: Get It Done
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **Toll’s Companions** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Celestial Hurricanum
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Portents of Battle
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to D3 visible friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for the targets’ combat attacks until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Storm of Shemtek
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Make a number of D3 rolls equal to the current battle round number. For each 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Cogsmith
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Duardin

abilities.name: Direct the Gyrocorps
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 visible friendly **Gyrocopter** or **Gyrobomber** units wholly within 18" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 3+, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Dark Riders
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

abilities.name: Sow Havoc
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+:

• Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.
• This unit can immediately use the ‘Retreat’ ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

warscrolls.name: Darkshards
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

abilities.name: Storm of Iron-tipped Bolts
abilities.effect: If this unit has not used a **MOVE** ability this turn and was not set up this turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Master‑crafted** **Repeater Crossbows** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Doralia ven Denst
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Weapons of Banishment
abilities.effect: Double the Damage characteristic of this unit’s weapons for attacks that target **WIZARDS**, **PRIESTS** and **MANIFESTATIONS**.

warscrolls.name: Drakespawn Chariot
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

abilities.name: Scythed Runners
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Drakespawn Knights
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

abilities.name: Bestial Instincts
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Drakespawn’s Ferocious Jaws** while it is in combat with any damaged enemy units or while it is in combat with any enemy units that have had any models slain.

warscrolls.name: Drasher Vorn, the Rampaging Beast
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Fury of the Wildlands
abilities.declare: You must use this ability.
abilities.effect:
If any enemy models have been slain by this unit’s combat attacks this turn, until the end of the next turn:

• This unit cannot use **RETREAT** abilities.
• Add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s combat attacks.

abilities.name: Ebon Claw
abilities.effect: Allocate D3 damage points to this unit (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points). Then, add the number of damage points allocated to this unit by this ability this turn to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Dreadlord on Black Dragon
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Fly, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

melee.name: Black Dragon’s Fearsome Jaws and Claws

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Black Dragon’s Fearsome Jaws and Claws** is 4.

abilities.name: Under the Shadow of Black Wings
abilities.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls for friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR AELF CAVALRY** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Indiscriminate Slaughter
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick all units (friendly and enemy) within this unit’s combat range, excluding this unit, to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Dreadspears
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

abilities.name: Coven Guard
abilities.effect: If this unit did not charge this turn, add 1 to wound rolls for this unit’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Drolf Ironhead, the Grizzled Explorer
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Duardin

abilities.name: Expert Ranger
abilities.declare: If this unit is not in combat, pick a non-**FACTION TERRAIN** terrain feature within 3" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again within 3" of the target and not in combat.

abilities.name: Runic Axes
abilities.effect: While this unit is in combat with 2 or more enemy units, this unit’s **Runic Axes** have **Crit (2 Hits)**.

warscrolls.name: Edmark Valoran, the Manticore Knight
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Shield of the Manticore
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of weapons used for attacks that target friendly **INFANTRY HEROES** while those friendly units are within 3" of this unit.

abilities.name: Emberstone-riddled Flesh
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 1 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after that **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Executioners
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

abilities.name: Severing Strike
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, this unit’s attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+.

warscrolls.name: Flagellants
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Glorious Martyrs
abilities.effect: Each time a model in this unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly **Pontifex Zenestra**. On a 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Freeguild Cavalier-Marshal
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: 'For Sigmar, Charge!'
abilities.effect: Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit and for friendly **Freeguild Cavaliers** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Run Down The Foe
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN CAVALRY** unit that charged this turn and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: This unit and the target have **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Freeguild Cavaliers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/5), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Devastating Charge
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit that is in combat. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Freeguild Command Corps
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Standard Bearer (1/6), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: The Marshal's Retinue
abilities.effect: While any friendly **Freeguild Marshal and Relic Envoy** units are wholly within this unit’s combat range, both this unit and those friendly units have **WARD (5+)**.

abilities.name: Freeguild Adjutants
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Any Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, the first time the target uses the ‘Redeploy’, ‘Rally’, ‘Covering Fire’ or ‘Counter-charge’ command, you can pick another friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN** unit wholly within 12" of this unit and that has not used a command this phase to use the same command immediately after the first has been resolved (this is an exception to Commands, 1.2). You must still spend command points as normal to use the command a second time.

abilities.name: Dispatch Spies
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Reaction: Opponent declared a command for a unit within 12" of this unit
abilities.effect: Unless your opponent spends 1 additional command point to use that command, the command has no effect, it still counts as having been used and the command points spent to use the command are still lost.

warscrolls.name: Freeguild Fusiliers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/10), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Fortify Position
abilities.effect: This unit establishes a fortified position and remains in a fortified position until it either uses a **MOVE** ability or is removed from the battlefield. While this unit is in a fortified position, subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of weapons used for attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Fusiliers, Fire!
abilities.effect: Each time this unit uses a **SHOOT** ability, if it is in a **fortified position**, it can pick either of the ranged weapon profiles for all the attacks it makes with its **Fusil‐cannons**. If it is not in a fortified position, use the **Mobile** weapon characteristics.

abilities.name: Blackpowder Squire
abilities.effect: This unit has a **Blackpowder Squire** token. Each time this unit uses a **SHOOT** ability, if this unit’s **Blackpowder Squire** is on the battlefield, you can re-roll 1 hit roll. If a hit roll re-rolled in this manner is 1, remove this unit’s **Blackpowder Squire** from the battlefield.

warscrolls.name: Freeguild Marshal and Relic Envoy
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Rousing Orator
abilities.effect: Add 3 to the control scores of other friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Attendant Relic Envoy
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN** wholly within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Place this unit’s **Relic Envoy** next to the target (if this unit’s **Relic Envoy** is currently next to a different friendly unit, move it next to the target).

While the target has a Relic Envoy next to it, it can be picked to be the target of an **OFFICAR’S ORDER** ability even if it is not wholly within 12" of the friendly **HERO** using that ability.

If this unit is destroyed, remove its **Relic Envoy** from the battlefield.

warscrolls.name: Freeguild Marshal on Griffon
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Fly, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

melee.name: Griffon’s Razor Claws and Deadly Beak

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Griffon’s Razor Claws and Deadly Beak** is 4.

abilities.name: Piercing Bloodroar
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 4+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Tactical Acumen
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared the ‘Redeploy’ command for a friendly CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN unit wholly within 12" of this unit
abilities.effect: If you roll a 1-3 when determining the distance that unit can move, you can use a value of 4 instead.

warscrolls.name: Freeguild Steelhelms
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Consecrate the Land
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit is contesting an objective you control that is not contested by any enemy models, roll a dice.
abilities.effect: On a 3+, that objective is considered by you to be consecrated. While each model in a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN** unit is contesting a consecrated objective, that unit has **WARD (5+)**. If your opponent gains control of a consecrated objective, it is no longer consecrated.

warscrolls.name: Fusil-Major on Ogor Warhulk
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Fortify Position
abilities.effect: This unit establishes a fortified position and remains in a fortified position until it either uses a **MOVE** ability or is removed from the battlefield. While this unit is in a fortified position, subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of weapons used for attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Mark Targets
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that was targeted by this unit’s shooting attacks this turn to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN** units that target that unit for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Galen ven Denst
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Weapons of Banishment
abilities.effect: Double the Damage characteristic of this unit’s weapons for attacks that target **WIZARDS**, **PRIESTS** and **MANIFESTATIONS**.

abilities.name: Guardian and Mentor
abilities.effect: While a friendly **Doralia ven Denst** is wholly within this unit’s combat range, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** and both this unit and that **Doralia ven Denst** have **WARD (5+)**.

warscrolls.name: Gyrobomber
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Fly, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Duardin

abilities.name: Grudgebuster Bombs
abilities.declare: If this unit used a **MOVE** ability this phase, pick an enemy unit that does not have **FLY** and that this unit passed across this turn to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

***Tactical Bombing:*** Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

***Drop It All!:*** Make 2 rolls of D3. For each 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Then, roll a D3 for each unit (friendly and enemy) within the target’s combat range that does not have **FLY**. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll. Once the ‘Drop It All!’ effect of this ability has been resolved, this unit cannot use this ability again for the rest of the battle.

warscrolls.name: Gyrocopter
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Fly, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Duardin

abilities.name: Guild Bombs
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit used a **MOVE** ability this phase, pick an enemy unit that does not have **FLY** and that this unit passed across this turn to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Hammerers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Duardin

abilities.name: Oathsworn
abilities.effect: While any friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR DUARDIN INFANTRY HEROES** are wholly within this unit’s combat range, both this unit and those friendly units have **WARD (5+)**.

warscrolls.name: Hexbane's Hunters
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (5+), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Hunt With Conviction
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **HERO** or **WIZARD** to be **hunted by the Order**. You must pick a **WIZARD HERO** if there is one in your opponent’s army.
abilities.effect:
Add 1 to the damage inflicted by this unit’s attacks that target the unit picked to be **hunted by the Order**.

**Designer’s Note:** *You can pick an enemy unit that is in reserve.*

abilities.name: Flamewood Stakes
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Add 1 to the damage inflicted (if any) on the target if it has the **DEATH**, **DAEMON** or **WIZARD** keyword.

warscrolls.name: Inara Sion, the Cleansing Blade
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Sacred Amphora
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly unit within 3" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: **Heal (2D3)** the target.

abilities.name: Barrier of Water
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target. Then, make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time the target is picked to use a **MOVE** ability, roll a dice as a reaction. On a 3+, the target cannot end that move closer to this unit.

warscrolls.name: Ironbreakers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Duardin

abilities.name: Gromril Shieldwall
abilities.effect: While this unit is affected by the ‘Hold the Line’ **OFFICAR’S ORDER** ability, it has **WARD (4+)** instead of **WARD (5+)**.

warscrolls.name: Irondrakes
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Duardin

abilities.name: Cinderblast Bomb
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit is not in combat, pick a visible enemy unit within 6" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Ironweld Great Cannon
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Fortify Position
abilities.effect: This unit establishes a fortified position and remains in a fortified position until it either uses a **MOVE** ability or is removed from the battlefield. While this unit is in a fortified position, subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of weapons used for attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Shot and Shell
abilities.effect: Each time this unit uses a **SHOOT** ability, if it is in a fortified position, pick either the **Cannonball** or **Grapeshot** weapon characteristics for all the attacks it makes with its **Great Cannon**. If it is not in a fortified position, use the **Grapeshot** weapon characteristics.

warscrolls.name: Jacobus Vyne, the Jade Wizard
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Verdant Growth
abilities.declare: Pick an objective or visible non-**FACTION TERRAIN** terrain feature within 12" of this unit to be the target. Then, make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the battle, subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly **INFANTRY** or **CAVALRY** units while they are wholly within 3" of the target.

abilities.name: Summon Wisper
abilities.effect: If there is not a friendly **Wisper** on the battlefield, set up a friendly **Wisper** wholly within 12" of this unit, visible to it and more than 9" from all enemy units. This unit has summoned that **MANIFESTATION**.

warscrolls.name: Kharibdyss
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

abilities.name: Abyssal Howl
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 5 from the target’s control score for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Longbeards
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Duardin

abilities.name: 'I Thought Duardin Were Made Of Sterner Stuff!'
abilities.effect: Add 2 to the control scores of friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR DUARDIN** units, excluding **Longbeards** units, while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Luminark of Hysh
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Aura of Protection
abilities.effect: Friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** units have **WARD (6+)** while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Searing Beam of Light
abilities.effect: Each time this unit attacks with its **Searing Beam of Light**, pick a point on the battlefield within range to be the target. If the attack scores a hit, draw a straight line between that point and the closest point on this unit’s base. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each visible unit (friendly and enemy) that the line passes across.

warscrolls.name: Pontifex Zenestra, Matriarch of the Great Wheel
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Priest (2), Infantry, Ward (4+), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Vessel of Sigmar
abilities.declare: Make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects to apply until the start of your next turn. Pick up to 2 different effects instead if the chanting roll was 10+.

***The Great Wheel Turns:*** Add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN** units if they are wholly within 12" of this unit at the start of the move.

***Hallowed Ground:*** Friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN** units have **WARD (5+)** while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

***Cast Out Evil:*** Roll a D3 for each enemy **WIZARD** and **PRIEST** on the battlefield. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Voice of the God-king
abilities.effect: This unit can use the ‘Unbind’ ability as if it had **WIZARD (1)**.

warscrolls.name: Runelord
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Duardin

abilities.name: Forgefire
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR DUARDIN** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons. In addition, if the chanting roll was 10+, pick another friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR DUARDIN** unit wholly within 12" of this unit. Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of that unit’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn as well.

abilities.name: Runes of Spellbreaking
abilities.effect: This unit can use the ‘Unbind’ ability as if it had **WIZARD (1)**.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Freeguild Cavaliers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/5), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: The Red Work
abilities.declare: If this unit is in combat and has not charged this turn, pick this unit and up to 1 friendly **Freeguild Cavalier-Marshal** or **Freeguild Marshal on Griffon** within this unit’s combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if there are fewer models in this unit than the total number of enemy models in units that are in combat with this unit. On a 4+, for the rest of the turn, the targets count as having charged.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Pontifex Zenestra, Matriarch of the Great Wheel
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Priest (2), Infantry, Ward (4+), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

melee.name: Sceptre of the Wheel and Acolytes’ Weapons

abilities.name: Sigmar's Will
abilities.declare: Make a chanting roll of D6. If the roll is an unmodified 1, you can re-roll the dice.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects. Pick up to 2 different effects instead if the chanting roll was 10+:

***Hallowed Ground:*** Until the start of your next turn, enemy units using the ‘Normal Move’ ability cannot end that move within 5" of a friendly **CITIES** **OF SIGMAR HUMAN** unit while it is wholly within 12" of this unit.
***Fervent Prayers:*** Until the start of your next turn, each time a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN** model is slain by a combat attack while it is wholly within 12" of this unit and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a dice. On a 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.
***Salvation:*** Pick 1 friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN** unit that is more than 12" from this unit and not in combat to be the target. Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units. That unit cannot use **CHARGE** abilities for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Word of the God-King
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **WIZARD, PRIEST** or **MANIFESTATION** within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+:
•If the target is a **MANIFESTATION**, it is banished and removed from the battlefield.
•If the target is a **WIZARD** or **PRIEST**, inflict an amount of mortal damage on it equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Scourgerunner Chariot
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

abilities.name: Lay The Beast Low
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for this unit’s shooting attacks that target enemy **MONSTERS**.

warscrolls.name: Sorceress
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

abilities.name: Word of Pain
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from hit rolls and wound rolls for the target’s attacks until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Cruel Sacrifice
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR AELF** unit wholly within 6" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit for the rest of the turn. Then, roll a dice. On a 4+, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

warscrolls.name: Sorceress on Black Dragon
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Fly, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

melee.name: Black Dragon’s Fearsome Jaws and Claws

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Black Dragon’s Fearsome Jaws and Claws** is 4.

abilities.name: Command Underlings
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR AELF INFANTRY** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be targets.
abilities.effect: Add 3" to the Move characteristic of each target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Feed on Life Force
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If any enemy models are slain by this ability, place a **dark** **sorcery** token next to this unit for the rest of the battle, to a maximum of 3 tokens.

abilities.name: Dark Sorcery
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit for each **dark sorcery token** it has.

warscrolls.name: Steam Tank
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: More Pressure!
abilities.effect:
Roll 2D6. If the roll is less than the number of damage points this unit has, inflict D3 mortal damage on this unit. Otherwise, pick 1 of the following effects to apply to this unit until the start of your next turn:

***Power the Wheels:*** This unit can use a **RUN** ability and still use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities later in the turn.

***Power the Guns:*** Add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Steam Gun**.

warscrolls.name: Steam Tank Commander
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, War Machine, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Division Commander
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 2 friendly **Steam Tank** units to be the targets.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to hit rolls for shooting attacks made by this unit and by each target.

abilities.name: More Pressure!
abilities.effect:
Roll 2D6. If the roll is less than the number of damage points this unit has, inflict D3 mortal damage on this unit. Otherwise, pick 1 of the following effects to apply to this unit until the start of your next turn:

***Power the Wheels:*** This unit can use a **RUN** ability and still use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities later in the turn.

***Power the Guns:*** Add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Steam Gun**.

warscrolls.name: Tahlia Vedra, Lioness of the Parch
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Fly, Ward (6+), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Infernadine’s Leonine Jaws** is 2.

abilities.name: Paralysing Venom
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **MONSTER** that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Lead From The Front
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit is in combat, pick up to 3 other friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
For each target:
• Add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by that unit for the rest of the turn.
• That unit has **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Unparalleled Tactician
abilities.effect: When this unit uses an **OFFICAR’S ORDER** ability, you can pick an additional friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be a target of that ability.

warscrolls.name: Toll's Companions
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Saviours of Cinderfall
abilities.effect: While a friendly **Callis and Toll** unit is wholly within this unit’s combat range, both this unit and that **Callis and Toll** unit have **WARD (5+)**.

abilities.name: Hidden Agents
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and a friendly **Callis and Toll** unit in the same regiment as this unit if those units have not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up those units in reserve **in the shadows**. Those units have now been deployed.

abilities.name: Emerge from the Shadows
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **in the shadows**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. Then, set up the **Callis and Toll** unit that was set up **in the shadows** with this unit wholly within 6" of it and more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: War Hydra
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Aelf

abilities.name: Sever One Head, Another Takes Its Place
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, End of Any Turn
abilities.effect: **Heal (6)** this unit.

abilities.name: Six-headed Strike
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Make 6 rolls of D3. For each roll that exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Warden King
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Cities of Sigmar, Duardin

abilities.name: Ancestral Grudgebearer
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in your opponent’s army to bear a grudge against. You can pick an enemy unit that is in reserve.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the battle, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR DUARDIN** units that target that unit.

abilities.name: Fearless Leader
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO CITIES OF SIGMAR DUARDIN** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Wildercorps Hunters
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/11), Order, Cities of Sigmar, Human

abilities.name: Expert Trackers
abilities.effect: This unit can use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

abilities.name: Hidden and Dangerous
abilities.effect: This unit is not visible to enemy units more than 12" from it while it is affected by the ‘Cover’ terrain ability. In addition, add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s shooting attacks while it is wholly within 3" of a terrain feature.

warscrolls.name: Wisper
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Order, Cities of Sigmar

abilities.name: Spiritual Locus
abilities.effect: Each time a friendly **Jacobus Vyne** uses a **SPELL** or **SHOOT** ability, you can measure range and visibility from this **MANIFESTATION** instead of from that friendly unit.

rules.name: Canny Crews
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
rules.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **Ironweld Great Cannon** units to be the targets.
rules.effect: For the rest of the turn, each time the target uses a **SHOOT** ability, you can re-roll 1 hit roll, or 1 wound roll, or 1 random characteristic roll for the Damage characteristic.

rules.name: Front-Line Leader
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
rules.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN INFANTRY HERO** to use this ability. Then, you can pick up to 1 friendly non-**HERO** **HUMAN INFANTRY** unit and up to 1 friendly **HUMAN WAR MACHINE** unit that are wholly within 12" of that **HERO** to be the targets.
rules.effect: While the targets are wholly within 12" of that **HERO**, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target **INFANTRY** unit’s melee weapons and the target **WAR MACHINE** unit’s ranged weapons until the start of your next turn.

rules.name: 'Forwards, Dawners!'
rules.effect: Add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** units in the first battle round.

rules.name: Bulwark Zone
rules.effect:
Friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** units that have the ‘Fortify Position’ ability start the first battle round in a fortified position.

In addition, in the first battle round, subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** units while they are wholly within friendly territory.

rules.name: Faith and Firepower
rules.effect: Add 3" to the Range characteristic of ranged weapons used by friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** units.

rules.name: Eldritch Expertise
rules.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR WIZARDS**.

spells.name: Oath and Steel
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6. Add 1 to the roll if the chanter is **DUARDIN**.
spells.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target that unit until the start of your next turn. In addition, if the chanting roll was 10+, add 1 to save rolls for the target until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Wrath and Ruin
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Roll 6 dice. If the chanting roll was 8+, roll 9 dice instead. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. If 3 or more damage points are allocated to the target as a result of those dice rolls, ignore positive modifiers to save rolls for the target until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Unfaltering Aim
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s shooting attacks for the rest of the turn. In addition, if the chanting roll was 10+, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s shooting attacks for the rest of the turn.

spells.name: Cindercloud
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons.

spells.name: Speed of the Twin-tailed Comet
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit wholly within 12" to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a maximum of 3.

spells.name: Elemental Lightning
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them that has not been picked to be the target of this ability this turn to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Then, roll a dice for each other enemy unit within the target’s combat range. On a 4+, inflict D3 mortal damage on that unit.

artefacts.name: Brazier of Holy Flame
artefacts.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO CITIES OF SIGMAR INFANTRY** unit that is not in combat and wholly within 12" of this unit.
artefacts.effect: You can return up to D3 slain models to that unit.

artefacts.name: Glimmering
artefacts.effect: Each phase, you can re-roll 1 hit roll, or 1 wound roll, or 1 save roll for this unit.

artefacts.name: Sacred Tome
artefacts.effect:
If this unit is not a **PRIEST**, it has **PRIEST (1)**. If this unit is already a **PRIEST**, add 1 to chanting rolls for this unit.

If this unit is a **WIZARD**, it cannot use **SPELL** abilities and **PRAYER** abilities in the same phase.

heroicTraits.name: Astute Tactician
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to charge rolls for the target and add 2 to run rolls for the target.

heroicTraits.name: Draw Steel!
heroicTraits.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN** unit that charged this turn and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Cosmopolitan Leader
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR INFANTRY** or **CAVALRY** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target. If this unit is **HUMAN**, pick up to 3 eligible units to be the targets instead.
heroicTraits.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+, until the start of your next turn:

• If the target is **HUMAN**, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks.
• If the target is **DUARDIN**, add 1 to charge rolls for the target.
• If the target is **AELF**, add 3 to the target’s control score.

heroicTraits.name: Grizzled Veteran
heroicTraits.effect: If the unmodified wound roll for an attack that targets this unit is a 1-3, the attack fails and the attack sequence ends.

heroicTraits.name: Fiery Temper
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit charged this turn, you can re-roll charge rolls for friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** units while they are wholly within 18" of this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Master of Ballistics
heroicTraits.effect: If a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit uses the ‘All-out Attack’ command in the shooting phase while it is within this unit’s combat range, add 1 to wound rolls for that unit’s shooting attacks in that phase. This effect is in addition to the effect of ‘All-out Attack’.

other.name: Rune of Restored Hearth
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Hero Phase
other.effect: If the **Runelord** in the Regiment of Renown is contesting an objective, for the rest of the battle, units in this Regiment of Renown have **WARD (5+)** while they are contesting that objective.

other.name: Wrath and Ruin
other.declare: Pick the **Runelord** in this Regiment of Renown to chant this prayer, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
other.effect: Roll 6 dice. If the chanting roll was 8+, roll 9 dice instead. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. If 3 or more damage points are allocated to the target as a result of those dice rolls, ignore positive modifiers to save rolls for the target until the start of your next turn.

other.name: Duty Bound
other.effect: While every model in the same unit in the Regiment of Renown is contesting the same objective, add 1 to save rolls and ward rolls for that unit.

other.name: Sigmar's Justice
other.declare: Pick an enemy unit to be **marked for justice**. You can pick a unit that is in reserve.
other.effect: For the rest of the battle, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by units in this Regiment of Renown that target a unit that is **marked for justice**.

battleTraits.name: Hold The Line
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HERO** that has not used an **OFFICAR’S ORDER** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit wholly within 12" of that **HERO** and that did not charge this turn to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
The target has **STRIKE-LAST** and **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the turn.

In addition, if the target is **DUARDIN**, subtract 1 from hit rolls for combat attacks that target that unit for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Suppressing Fire
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HERO** that has not used an **OFFICAR’S ORDER** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit wholly within 12" of that **HERO** to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Each time the target uses a **SHOOT** ability this phase, if all of its attacks targeted the same enemy unit, after that ability has been resolved, roll a dice. If the result is equal to or less than the number of models in that enemy unit that were slain by shooting attacks this phase, that enemy unit has **STRIKE‑LAST** for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Advance in Formation
battleTraits.declare:
Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HERO** that has not used an **OFFICAR’S ORDER** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit wholly within 12" of that **HERO** and not in combat to be the target.

If the target is **HUMAN**, you can pick an additional **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit wholly within 12" of that **HERO** and not in combat to be a target. You cannot pick the same unit to be a target of this ability more than once per turn.
battleTraits.effect: Each target can move 3". Each target cannot move into combat during any part of that move.

battleTraits.name: Strike Them Down
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR HERO** that has not used an **OFFICAR’S ORDER** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit that charged this turn that is wholly within 12" of that **HERO** to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

In addition, if the target is an **AELF** unit, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s combat attacks for the rest of the turn.
